panels.description: Current CO2 reading independent of dashboard time range

targets.rawSql:
SELECT co2 AS "CO2"
FROM airquality
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: CO2 Current

panels.description: Current PM 2.5 (compensated) reading independent of dashboard time range

targets.rawSql:
SELECT pm_025_comp AS "PM_2.5"
FROM airquality
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: PM_2.5 Current

panels.description: Current TVOC index reading independent of dashboard time range

targets.rawSql:
SELECT tvoc_index AS "TVOC"
FROM airquality
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: VOCs Current

panels.description: Current temperature reading independent of dashboard time range

targets.rawSql:
SELECT temperature_c AS "Temp"
FROM airquality
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: Temp

panels.description: Current relative humidity reading independent of dashboard time range

targets.rawSql:
SELECT humidity_pct AS "Humidity"
FROM airquality
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: Hum %

panels.description: CO2 readings colored by same scheme as Airgradient official dashboards (as of 2025-12)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time, co2 as "Excellent"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND co2 < 800
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT time, co2 as "Acceptable"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND co2 >= 800 AND co2 < 1000
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT time, co2 as "Not ideal"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND co2 >= 1000 AND co2 < 1500
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT time, co2 as "To be avoided"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND co2 >= 1500
ORDER BY time ASC;

panels.title: CO2

panels.description: TVOC Index readings colored by same scheme as Airgradient official dashboards (as of 2025-12)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time, tvoc_index as "Good"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND tvoc_index < 140
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT time, tvoc_index as "Acceptable"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND tvoc_index >= 140 AND tvoc_index < 250
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT time, tvoc_index as "Undesirable"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND tvoc_index >= 250 AND tvoc_index < 400
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT time, tvoc_index as "High"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND tvoc_index >= 400
ORDER BY time ASC;

panels.title: VOCs

panels.description: Temperature readings colored by same scheme as Airgradient official dashboards (as of 2025-12)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time, temperature_c as "Freezing"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND temperature_c < 0
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT time, temperature_c as "Cold"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND temperature_c >= 0 AND temperature_c < 10
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT time, temperature_c as "Cool"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND temperature_c >= 10 AND temperature_c < 15
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT time, temperature_c as "Fresh"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND temperature_c >= 15 AND temperature_c < 18
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT time, temperature_c as "Room"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND temperature_c >= 18 AND temperature_c < 20
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT time, temperature_c as "Warm"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND temperature_c >= 20 AND temperature_c < 23
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT time, temperature_c as "Stuffy"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND temperature_c >= 23 AND temperature_c < 25
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT time, temperature_c as "Hot"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND temperature_c >= 25
ORDER BY time ASC;

panels.title: Temperature

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  MAX(nox_index) AS "NOX"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo;

panels.description: Relative humidity readings colored by same scheme as Airgradient official dashboards (as of 2025-12)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time, humidity_pct as "Wet"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND humidity_pct >= 70
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT time, humidity_pct as "Humid"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND humidity_pct >= 60 AND humidity_pct < 70
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT time, humidity_pct as "Damp"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND humidity_pct >= 50 AND humidity_pct < 60
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT time, humidity_pct as "Normal"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND humidity_pct >= 30 AND humidity_pct < 50
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT time, humidity_pct as "Dry"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND humidity_pct >= 20 AND humidity_pct < 30
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT time, humidity_pct as "Arid"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND humidity_pct < 20
ORDER BY time ASC;

panels.title: Humidity

panels.description: PM 2.5 (compensated) readings colored by same scheme as Airgradient official dashboards (as of 2025-12)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time, pm_025_comp as "Good"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND pm_025_comp < 6
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT time, pm_025_comp as "Moderate"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND pm_025_comp >= 6 AND pm_025_comp < 12
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT time, pm_025_comp as "Borderline"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND pm_025_comp >= 12 AND pm_025_comp < 18
ORDER BY time ASC;

SELECT time, pm_025_comp as "Unhealthy"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
  AND pm_025_comp >= 18
ORDER BY time ASC;

panels.title: PM_2.5 (mass)

panels.description: Particle counts per deciliter of air at 0.3, 1, 5, and 10 µm

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time, pm_003_ct AS "0.3 µm",
             pm_010_ct AS "1 µm",
             pm_050_ct AS "5 µm",
             pm_100_ct AS "10 µm"
FROM airquality
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom
  AND time <= $__timeTo
ORDER BY time ASC;

panels.title: Particle Counts
